com.google.android.drdat.gui.DrdatFormCollector

DrdatFormCollector Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Acts as an interface to the web form data.

Takes care of saving web form data to the drdat_data db. Form data is encoded via javascript and saved as a string in the query field in the drdat_data table. This way we don't have to know what the structure of the form is. Data is basically returned to the smi in this form with some additional fields. DrdatDataProvider acts as a content provider for this class.

Author:
cal

void doAction ( String  action  ) 

Responds to an action on the form.

You can move forward, go back or save the data.

This is currently decoupled from actually sending the data.

Parameters:
data 

boolean saveQueryToDB (  ) 

Saves the data we've accumulated.

The cl will periodically gather this data and send it to smi via a content provider interface.

Returns:
true if we were able to save the data to the db

static Cursor query ( Context  context,
String[]  projection,
String  selection,
String[]  selectionArgs,
String  sortOrder 
) [static]

Query method used by the DrdatDataProvider content provider.

Uses the context provided to make a new DrdatFormCollector object and run the query.

Parameters:
context what called us
projection fields to get
selection where clause minus "where"
selectionArgs data for any place holder "?"s in the selection
sortOrder order by clause w/o the "order by"
Returns:
cursor to query results

static int delete ( Context  context,
String  selection,
String[]  selectionArgs 
) [static]

Static method that will delete a selection of records.

Note that this cannot be undone.

Parameters:
context who called us
selection where part of sql statement w/o the "where"
selectionArgs any arguments needed to replace "?" place holders in selection
Returns:
number of records deleted
